snippet: Novak Djokovic won his 15th straight match, and Roger Federer avenged last week’s loss to Juan Martín del Potro, setting up a semifinal between the two at the Paris Masters.
abstract: Novak Djokovic and Roger Federer advance through their quarterfinal matches to meet in semis at Paris Maters; other tennis news noted.
lead_paragraph: Novak Djokovic won his 15th straight match, and Roger Federer avenged last week’s loss to Juan Martín del Potro, setting up a semifinal between the two at the Paris Masters.
